title: Just: a tool to store and execute your project commands
content: “Just” (or “Justfile”) is a handy command-line tool that simplifies the execution of project-specific commands tasks. In this tutorial, we’ll explore why and how to use “Just” to enhance your day-by-day command line tasks.
